general.gigTitle: develop full stack website, web application, web based software

sellerCard.oneLiner: Creating custom, cutting edge web solutions that exceed expectations
sellerCard.description: As a full stack web developer with experience in both Ruby on Rails and React JS, I possess a unique skillset that allows me to create innovative and dynamic web applications. My proficiency in Ruby on Rails enables me to build scalable and robust backend systems, while my expertise in React JS allows me to craft beautiful and responsive user interfaces. With a deep understanding of these technologies, I can create seamless end-to-end web solutions that deliver an exceptional user experience.

description.content:
I will build and deploy a website using Ruby on Rails, Tailwind CSS, React JS. With my expertise in these advanced technologies, I can create a web app that is visually stunning, highly responsive, and easy to use.


Features:

  1. Building a web app: I will build a fully functional web app from scratch using Ruby on Rails, Tailwind CSS, React JS
  2. Custom design: I will create a unique and custom design based on your brand and preferences.
  3. Responsive design: I will ensure that your web app is responsive and works seamlessly on all devices, including desktops, laptops, tablets, and mobile devices.
  4. Search engine optimization: I will optimize your web app for search engines, making it easier for potential customers to find you online.
  5. Speed optimization: I will optimize your website for fast loading speeds, providing a better user experience for your visitors.
  6. Testing and bug fixing: I will conduct thorough testing to identify and fix any bugs or issues before deployment.


My goal is to provide you with a professional and hassle-free experience, ensuring that your project is delivered on time, within budget, and to your satisfaction.

openGraph.title: develop full stack website, web application, web based software

reviews.comment: I have to take the time to write this review fairly. I truly appreciate the human skills when it comes to “how you should deal with your customers”. Ahsan is a young decent man who will go above and beyond to be not only efficient, but also informative. Dealing with I’m is comfortable since he make sure to explain to you how things work and keep you aware and equipped to take your decisions confidently. Besides recommending him, I’m also proud of him and defiantly will relay on him whenever I need a trusted person.
Ahsan was very professional and was quick to do the work. This is the third time I've worked with him, and I look forward to working together again.
